CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Shadowfen relative to Azure Coast?
SRP.A: Shadowfen is {below} Azure Coast in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Desert relative to Shadowfen?
SRP.A: Sunstone Desert is {above} Shadowfen in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Desert relative to Azure Coast?
SRP.A: Sunstone Desert is {above} Azure Coast in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverwood Forest}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Azure Coast}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Shadowfen's maximum Housing Affordability Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Shadowfen's maximum Housing Affordability Index is in {1975}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Coast's minimum Housing Affordability Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Coast's minimum Housing Affordability Index is in {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1996, was the average total Housing Affordability Index higher or lower than between 1981 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total housing affordability index between 1989 and 1996 was {higher} than between 1981 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1987, was the average total Housing Affordability Index higher or lower than between 1985 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total housing affordability index between 1980 and 1987 was {lower} than between 1985 and 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 1983 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in 1983 was {lower} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1987, did the total Housing Affordability Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1976 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total housing affordability index between 1979 and 1987 was {smaller} than between 1976 and 1991.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverwood Forest} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Golden Delta and Silverwood Forest first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Golden Delta and Silverwood Forest first exchanged leading positions in {1975}.
